  16. ‌type 'a t = 'a option = None | Some of 'a

  18. ‌let none = None
  19. ‌let some v = Some v
  20. let value o ~default = match o with Some v -> v | None -> default
  21. ‌let get = function Some v -> v | None -> invalid_arg "option is None"
  22. ‌let bind o f = match o with None -> None | Some v -> f v
  23. ‌let join = function Some o -> o | None -> None
  24. ‌let map f o = match o with None -> None | Some v -> Some (f v)
  25. ‌let fold ~none ~some = function Some v -> some v | None -> none
  26. let iter f = function Some v -> f v | None -> ()
  27. let is_none = function None -> true | Some _ -> false
  28. let is_some = function None -> false | Some _ -> true

  30. let equal eq o0 o1 = match o0, o1 with
  31. | Some v0, Some v1 -> eq v0 v1
  32. | None, None -> true
  33. | _ -> false

  35. let compare cmp o0 o1 = match o0, o1 with
  36. | Some v0, Some v1 -> cmp v0 v1
  37. | None, None -> 0
  38. | None, Some _ -> -1
  39. | Some _, None -> 1

  41. let to_result ~none = function None -> Error none | Some v -> Ok v
  42. let to_list = function None -> [] | Some v -> [v]
  43. let to_seq = function None -> Seq.empty | Some v -> Seq.return v
